description: As tasty as they are colourful, these vibrant cabbage cups with juicy marinated pork will be an instant favourite. Try making them for your next barbecue.
keywords: Barbeque,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,BBQ,Oct 2021,High protein,BBQ pork,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Honey Soy Pork In Cabbage Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Packham pears, cored, cut into matchsticks
1 small red cabbage, halved, leaves separated (see Tip)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine honey and soy in a large dish. Add pork and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or overnight, if time permits.
Meanwhile, combine pear and lemon juice in a small bowl. Set aside until required, stirring occasionally.
Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium heat. Grill pork for 10 minutes, turning occasionally and brushing with marinade, or until caramelised and cooked through. Slice pork.
Divide carrot and drained pear among cabbage cups. Top with pork and onion. Serve.
